gui.controller

Class MakeOrderScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.MakeOrderScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MakeOrderScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for the Make Order Screen. Handles user interactions and data input related to making a new order.

      • validateGuiFields

        private boolean validateGuiFields()
        Validates the input fields in the graphical user interface (GUI) for creating a visit order. Checks if all required fields are filled, and if the entered data is valid according to specified rules.
        Returns:
        true if all fields pass validation and the input is deemed valid; false otherwise, along with an error message displayed for the invalid field(s).

      • onMakeOrderClicked

        public void onMakeOrderClicked()
        Validates the input fields in the GUI for making an order. Checks if all required fields are filled, if the input values are valid, and if the selected options are within constraints. Displays error messages for invalid fields.

      • createOrderFromFields
